title: How to Make Balloon Biscuits

steps.headline: Melt the butter in your microwave for 20 to 30 seconds, or until melted.
Flatten out 8 biscuits into the shape of an oval, using your hand.
Spray a cookie sheet with non-stick spray or grease with brush.
Place the flattened biscuits on cookie tray.
Place two marshmallows in the center of each biscuit and seal up the edges.
steps.description: Each biscuit should look like a pillow.

steps.headline: Roll the biscuit in the melted butter.
Roll the biscuit in the cinnamon and sugar mix.
Bake in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes.
steps.description: Keep a close watch on them as they will burn easily.

steps.headline: Remove from the oven and place on a cooling rack.
steps.description: Allow the biscuits to cool for a few minutes before eating.

text: Preparing the Ingredients Melt the butter in your microwave for 20 to 30 seconds, or until melted.  Set aside in a bowl.  Mix sugar and cinnamon together.  Set aside in a bowl  Flatten out 8 biscuits into the shape of an oval, using your hand.  Constructing the Balloon Biscuits Spray a cookie sheet with non-stick spray or grease with brush.  Place the flattened biscuits on cookie tray.  Place two marshmallows in the center of each biscuit and seal up the edges. Each biscuit should look like a pillow. Roll the biscuit in the melted butter.  Roll the biscuit in the cinnamon and sugar mix.  Bake in the preheated oven for 8 to 10 minutes. Keep a close watch on them as they will burn easily. Remove from the oven and place on a cooling rack. Allow the biscuits to cool for a few minutes before eating.
